website_summaries.verdict: A great travel wallet for consumers who don't have a lot to spend. It's crafted similarly to more expensive options with RFID blocking for a reasonable price.
pros: Affordable, yet made of strong nylon material with many pockets that travelers need
Zippered closure with pull cord and removable wrist trap are welcomed bonuses
Comes in red, Army green, gray, and brown
cons: Not quite as spacious as pricier wallets and a bit on the bulky side, but for the price you may not mind

customer_reviews.title: It's a great travel wallet
customer_reviews.text: It's a great travel wallet. It has room for everything you can possible need. Is comfortable to carry around by itself (holding keys and a phone with ease as well) or put in a bag or a purse to carry with you.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Light yet sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Light yet sturdy. Zippered closure keeps everything safely inside passport wallet. It has enough slots for all of our hotel, airline and rental car membership/loyalty cards. We had a similar passport holder that lasted 27 years. This had even more features like the pen holder and key holder, all with the rfid!
customer_reviews.author: crey

customer_reviews.title: Great travel wallet! Stay organized, while traveling!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great travel wallet to keep passports, boarding passes, etc. all together!! No more using a plastic bag and fumbling through everything! I love the design of this wallet. I will be so organized on my next trip! Can't wait to use it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great travel wallet
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a travel wallet that would be long enough to hold boarding passes, plus money, phone, ID, etc. I can never remember where I put boarding passes after going through security. This is perfect. Has zippered pockets inside and out. Open pocket outside that can hold boarding pass. Bright color is easy to spot in my tote bag. Wrist strap is securely attached (not part of the zipper!). Small zippered inside pocket for change. Removable key ring for the luggage key that I also always misplace. And as a bonus it's RFID blocking so my info stays secure.
customer_reviews.author: R. Camp

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Wallet to hold your documents and other cards
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace an old foldable sleeve i've been using to hold my passport and other travel documents. The price was right and when i got it, i was not disappointed. It holds my 2 passports in an easy reach pockets (you can sore more in other pockets), holds all my travel cards and other small items i need when traveling. Everything enclosed and zipped up and there's another external pocket for that fast reach. I also love the overall size that is not to big.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the Buck
customer_reviews.text: Came in so useful while traveling to Trinidad &Tobago, held both our passports, cash, coins & other documents with a firm grip. Very comfortable to hold. This is a keeper, just purchased another one.
customer_reviews.author: Y. S

customer_reviews.title: It is nice BUT the zipper compartment is not quite big enough ...
customer_reviews.text: It is nice BUT the zipper compartment is not quite big enough to hold my 8 1/2 X 11 travel documents that come off my printer folded in thirds. If it were about 1 inch wider it would have worked for me. Unfortunately I had to return it. If you can make it a little wider I would be interested in the future. Sorry..
customer_reviews.author: kavier

customer_reviews.title: If you travel, get this!
customer_reviews.text: Holds everything you need when traveling! Protects your CC's and passport. I take mine everywhere I travel. Zips up tight and fits in my carry on bags with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Tj hassler

customer_reviews.title: Necessary for Traveling!
customer_reviews.text: You definitely need some type of passport holder when traveling. This one had so many pockets and zippers. I could hold many important items and know that they were safe and secure. There's a side zip pocket inside, which allowed me to securely tuck away my passport and money. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Emilee

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet, made traveling a breeze!!
customer_reviews.text: This travel wallet is amazing!! It is the perfect hub for all your travel documents, money, credit cards, cash, etc. I was able to fit two passports easily as well as everything else I needed for travel. It made getting through the airports super easy and kept my bag organized. I would most absolutely recommend this to anyone traveling or those simply looking to organize.
customer_reviews.author: Megan T.

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy to see you!
customer_reviews.text: I can't give this four starts because I would prefer a different material (maybe oil cloth like my new Dorfman Pacific) - it is what it is for the price. But the design rocks. It will hold even my super-sized phablet in there (advice: put it on airplane mode so you don't wipe your stripes.) And it just works great once you get used to it. Not too big to make someone think I'm happy to see them. (i.e. fits in front pocket.)
customer_reviews.author: Xgenei

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This travel wallet will really fit my needs: holds all important documents securely (zippered), wrist strap, key fob, small zippered compartment for coins and my phone's 2nd 'sim' card when I travel internationally, enough slots for credit cards/drivers license, and - hopefully (haven't tried this yet) will fit the boarding pass when I fly. I chose red so it will be spotted easily inside my large purse or carry-on bag. The fabric feels substantial and it looks well-made. There's an outside pocket (zippered) that will be perfect for international currency (bills), to keep it separate from my US money. Would recommend this wallet!
customer_reviews.author: Bambri

customer_reviews.title: Different outer pocket than pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Quality and value seem good but the outer pocket doesn’t have a zipper pocket as pictured, also doesn’t have two outer pockets. I really liked the outer pocket design in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew A. Bliss

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for international travel
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my wife and I. Two passports, multiple cards and currencies, a pen, and a pad of paper. Made airports a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: D. Moreland

customer_reviews.title: Nice, good quality, but big/bulky
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good quality item and has lots of storage compartments. It was in my final 2 options for making a decision on what to take on a trip. I returned it because it is a little too large for packing light and compact for travel abroad. It would be nice if it had a neck strap to be able to wear it around the neck or cross body, or belt loops to wear it on your belt.
customer_reviews.author: Group home manager

customer_reviews.title: Worked good but honestly didn't use at all
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this item would work well for someone who wanted to use one, but when i brought it with me traveling thinking I'd want it and use it, it ended up just staying in my luggage for the entire trip and I didn't use it once.
customer_reviews.author: Jkell

customer_reviews.title: So far I LOVE this wallet
customer_reviews.text: So far I LOVE this wallet! I bought it for traveling to Japan but I've been using it for a week to try it out and it's perfect. The zippered pocket on the outside perfectly fits my Galaxy S9 plus with a case on. The passport fits nice and snug. I've even forgot to zip it up and even held upside down nothing drops out of the pockets. The zipper is smooth and secure. I love the color too. I may use this as my purse from now on...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, practical price.
customer_reviews.text: Since I was going to be traveling with numerous stops, and had tons of paperwork this while it came in very handy and keeping it organized. I have only used it once but I am confident it is sturdy enough to survive numerous additional adventures. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Karin A. Colantuono

customer_reviews.title: Very useful on vacation
customer_reviews.text: This came in very handy while we were on our way to Mexico. I didn't carry my purse, so this was very useful for storing/keeping my credit cards, passports, and money.
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha B. Rush

customer_reviews.title: compact but lots of storage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on spring break....that isn't happening. So I haven't gotten a chance to use it. But it has a lot of pockets and is fairly compact
customer_reviews.author: leftygirl

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend it
customer_reviews.text: It felt poorly made. The lids were not aligned, madebit looked crooked. The zipper was hard to close after fully opening the wallet. And the pockets for the passport were barely enough for mine (not a US passport). On the plus side, it fit in my pants back pocket. Didn't have the chance to test if it really blocks RFID readers.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Fav Travel Wallet
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd one of these wallets have had and used one for two years, still in great shape just wanted a new color. It is a great value and holds up to everyday wear and tear. Hold passport and any thing else you need when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Watch the dimensions...much larger than a wallet!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Didn’t notice the measurements.assumed being called a wallet it would be wallet size but it’s much bigger than my purse so it’s a waste for me...won’t be able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: lavenderose007

customer_reviews.title: Does not have straps.
customer_reviews.text: All the items fitted perfectly. Did not fit in my sport cross body purse. Should come with straps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice organizer for the world traveler.
customer_reviews.text: Very good so far, I've used it for several months and it holds all my cards, passport, cash and receipts well. I'd like a bit more holding strength where the cards are so they don't slip out but overall a decent product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike "Madbirder" Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job!
customer_reviews.text: Well it arrived in a good condition and the quality is better than expexted! There are many pockets in this wallet that allows you to easily fit all the needed stuff for traveling. The zipper somewhat is stiff that you need to work it out more than once to get it to fully open. For the price it does more than expected, would definitely recommend this wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Leen Kh.

customer_reviews.title: Holds plenty
customer_reviews.text: Holds plenty thats about all i can say wish i could find it in a color i liked better
customer_reviews.author: mkjlkbj

customer_reviews.title: Good product serves the purpose
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for it's actually better than what I thought I would get
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ostolski

customer_reviews.title: Useful but not pretty
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t look good but offers great quality and functionality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: harunphila

customer_reviews.title: He said it made him easy to organise for his trip
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my hubby and he took this for his recent trip. He said it made him easy to organise for his trip!! Keep all the receipts and cards and passport in one place! I might get one for me, as well :)
customer_reviews.author: Eunsil

customer_reviews.title: Very useful appropriate for a man or woman.  numerous secure compartments. Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of secure compartments and spaces for ID's check book and cards. Nice classy and an excellent looking buy.
customer_reviews.author: Med-Flight Doc.

customer_reviews.title: I will probably buy more
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing ever. It makes your life alot easier when you are traveling outside of country and want everything together so you dont loose it.

customer_reviews.title: Gurly
customer_reviews.text: Love the compartments and purchase for my son. He stated to lady looking but luv the compartments.

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Took this with us to Ireland. It held both passports, our car key, cash credit cards and all our receipts! And, was small enough to fit in my shoulder bag! I'm definitely glad that I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A Owens

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his travel wallet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who travels for work. He loved it. It was perfect for all his needs. It's made well and definitely worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria L

customer_reviews.title: Not very secure
customer_reviews.text: Simply put: the pockets/slots are not tight or deep. As a result, things like credit cards fall out quite easily every time you open the case. It is too risky to use it while traveling so I will no longer use it. It was only used one time and never again.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our trip to Ireland and used it frequently. We had everything in there including our maps and keys for the places we stayed. The zippers weren't necessarily my favorite, but for the price is was the best buy and performed it's function as expected
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Bird

customer_reviews.title: Love the Red Color
customer_reviews.text: Great Purchase. Holds everything you need for travel purposes. Multiple pockets a Plus.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: It was a great look, and a good quality. There were no loose strings on the item and the colors were vibrant. The price was perfect, and it made a wonderful gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for international travel
customer_reviews.text: worked great for recent international trip! Held documents for two travelers and passports.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Am taking two daughters and a friend each to Ireland on a 25-day vacation. They can keep valuable papers, money, passports, and other docs in the units. Decent quality and functions well. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph J Sandor

customer_reviews.title: Best everyday wallet.
customer_reviews.text: Works for what I needed. Will buy again when my first wears out.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PURCHASE

customer_reviews.author: TRAVEL BUG

customer_reviews.title: Love the overall size
customer_reviews.text: Love the overall size. The cards slide out when you have anything in the zipper pouch behind it. Very frustrating to open your wallet to have 4+ cards fall on the floor of the store. Make card pockets snugger please.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C.

customer_reviews.title: All your goods in one hand
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend got this for me for a trip and it is an awesome wallet. I usually keep a purse with too many extraneous items but this wallet literally has a place for everything. I loved the purple and black combo and the RFID protection.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. It hold everything I need & want and does not have too many pockets. The price I paid was great.

customer_reviews.title: Really helps me get through airport check in and boarding easier!
customer_reviews.text: I travel quite a bit and travel LIGHT! This really helps me get through airport check in and boarding easier! It's light weight - but has enough space for all of my stuff. Then I use it as my purse - my phone slips into the outside pocket and lipstick in inside zipper - then I don't have to take my backpack everywhere! Got one for my DILove too!

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Now I'm organized. Everything fits - Passport, documents, tickets, cash, keys, etc. And all in one location. My Travel Wallet is well made, light weight, and easy to open & close. Sure beats a ziploc, and it is nioce looking.

product_meta.title: Travelambo Travel Wallet Passport Holder Wallet RFID Blocking Credit Card Holders for Men & Women
feature_bullets: Size: 9.5" X 5.5" X 0.7" , made with High Density Waterproof Nylon.
This High Density Passport Holder fits your mobile, cards, cash, coins, a pen and other documents.It is a must have Travel Wallet for Convenient, Safe and Smart Travelling!

The Passport Wallet is simple, compact, lightweight, zippered, and multifunctional. Portable and Compact case, is easily held in Handbag passport holder. men's and women's travel gear case. An ideal travel accessory holder, a nice cover for your passport.
Special skin of the wallet protects your credit, debit and ID cards from criminals. Special skin prevents the passage of scans and digital readers, necessary during vacations and travel.
